ultimate_destination: Your ultimate destination for challenging and immersive golf experiences.
user_quote: I just signed up for RealGolf.Games, and I can already tell it's going to revolutionize how I enjoy practicing on the range. It's like unlocking a whole new level of fun!
ready_to_take_your_golf_game: Ready to take your golf game to the next level?
challenge_during_training: Whether you want to have a challange during training or just want to be more motivated going onto the Range and hit some Balls, RealGolf.Games is your place to go.
4Winning_description: In 4Winning, the objective is to strategically connect four pieces in a row. Our version of the game features a larger board than the standard 4x4 layout, with 8 columns and 9 rows. The additional columns on each side introduce a challenge: players must hit a specific distance within the lateral deviation. This aspect becomes more pronounced in Silver Mode and above, adding complexity and requiring players to carefully consider their moves.
4Winning_picture_alt: All teams are tie in Exact
Exact_description: Exact is a game where the objective is to hit 100 or below while scoring the most points. Players earn points based on the following criteria: Achieving exactly 100 meters awards 5 points, hitting multiples of ten earns 3 points, numbers with repeating digits score 2 points. Additionally, hitting the same row doubles the points earned. However, any other number exceeding 100 or falling below 5 results in a deduction of 1 point. Every other number between 5 and 100 scores 1 point. The challenge lies in balancing accuracy with maximizing points to achieve the highest score.
Precision_description: Precision is a game where the objective is to get as close to the targets as possible. For every meter you miss the target, you will receive a deduction of one point. The winner of the game is the player with the highest points at the end. The game concludes until only one player has points remaining. You can observe the distance you need to shoot and the current team, along with the remaining points for each team.
responsible_according_rstv: Responsible for the content according to § 55 Abs. 2 RStV
content_for_liability_for_content: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages according to Section 7, Paragraph 1 of the German Telemedia Act (TMG). According to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, however, we as a service provider are not obliged to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
content_for_liability_for_content_2: Obligations to remove or block the use of information according to general laws remain unaffected. However, liability in this regard is only possible from the point in time at which knowledge of a specific infringement of the law is known. As soon as we become aware of any violations of the law, we will remove this content immediately.
content_for_liability_for_links: Our offer contains links to external websites over which we have no influence. Therefore we cannot assume any liability for this external content. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal content was not recognizable at the time of linking.
content_for_liability_for_links_2: However, a permanent control of the content of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of an infringement. As soon as we become aware of legal violations, we will remove such links immediately.
content_for_copyright_imprint: The content and works on these pages created by the site operators are subject to German copyright law. The duplication, editing, distribution and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this site are only permitted for private, non-commercial use.
content_for_copyright_imprint_2: Insofar as the content on this site was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are observed. In particular contents of third parties are marked as such. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, we ask that you inform us accordingly. As soon as we become aware of legal violations, we will remove such content immediately.
faq_question_1_title: How can I create an account to play the games?
faq_answer_1_steps: Creating an account to play Real Golf is a simple process. Follow these steps to get started:
faq_answer_1_step_1_description: Go to the Register tab in the nav bar.
faq_answer_1_step_2_description: Enter an email, name, and password, then click on the register button.
faq_answer_1_step_3_description: You will automatically be redirected to the Login tab. Log in using your email and password.
faq_answer_1_step_4_description: After logging in, you can play all three games and save your progress in the database.
faq_answer_1_conclusion: By following these steps, you'll create an account that allows you to dive into the world of Real Golf and enjoy the various challenges they provide. Have fun!
faq_question_2_title: Are the games free to play?
faq_answer_2_content: Absolutely! Our games are completely free to play. All you need to do is create an account, and you'll have access to all the exciting challenges and fun that Real Golf has to offer. Get started today and enjoy the games without any cost.
faq_question_3_title: Can I contribute new Games to the project?
faq_answer_3_steps: Your creative input is highly valued! If you have exciting new game ideas, we encourage you to get involved. Here's how:
faq_answer_3_step_1_description: Feel free to open an Issue on our {github_link} repository and label it with "game". Your idea will be reviewed and considered by our team.
faq_answer_3_step_2_description: You can also share your ideas via email to {support_email}. We welcome your suggestions and will eagerly explore each one.
faq_answer_3_conclusion: For your valuable contributions, your name will be recognized in our {contributors} file. Your ideas can shape the future of Real Golf, and we greatly appreciate your input. Let's create amazing experiences together!
faq_question_4_title: How can I report bugs or suggest new features?
faq_answer_4_content_1: To report bugs, you can open an Issue on our {github_link} and label it with "bug." Alternatively, you can send an email to {support_email}.
faq_answer_4_content_2: To suggest new features, you can also open an issue on our {github_link} and label it with "feature." You can also send your suggestions via email to {support_email}.
faq_answer_5_content: No, the project is not open source. However, you are still very welcome to contribute by creating an Issue as described above. We appreciate your input and suggestions!
faq_question_6_title: How often are new updates or features added?
faq_answer_6_content: Rest assured, we're committed to providing a steady stream of new updates and exciting features. Our team is dedicated to enhancing your experience, and you can expect frequent additions to keep the excitement alive.
faq_question_7_title: Can I play the offline version on all devices?
faq_answer_7_content: Absolutely! The offline version is designed to be accessible on a wide range of devices. It functions just like a website, and it's pre-rendered upon opening to ensure seamless functionality even when there's no network connectivity. This means you can enjoy the games on various devices without worrying about a network connection.
faq_question_8_title: What programming languages are used in the project?
faq_answer_8_technologies: Our project is built using a combination of powerful technologies:
faq_answer_8_sveltekit: Frontend Development: We utilize the JavaScript Full Stack Framework, {svelte_kit}, along with TypeScript and Sass for crafting engaging and dynamic user interfaces.
faq_answer_8_mongodb: Backend Development: For the server-side aspect, we've harnessed the capabilities of {mongodb} to securely store user data and ensure smooth interactions.
faq_answer_8_conclusion: This versatile tech stack empowers us to create a seamless user experience and a robust backend infrastructure.
faq_further_questions_content: If you have any additional questions, don't hesitate to reach out to us. Simply send an email to {support_email} with your question. We'll respond promptly and may even consider adding your question to this FAQ to help other users.
faq_question_9_title: Can I change my Password after registration?
faq_answer_9_steps: Absolutely! You have the flexibility to change your password at any time. Here's how:
faq_answer_9_steps_1: Navigate to Account Settings: Log in to your account and go to the "Account" tab.
faq_answer_9_steps_2: Update Password: In the "Account" section, you'll find an option to change your password. Simply enter your new password in the designated input field.
faq_answer_9_steps_3: Save Changes: After entering your new password, click on the "Update" button to save your changes.
faq_answer_9_conclusion: By following these steps, you can easily update your password and keep your account secure.
faq_question_10_title: Is my Personal Information safe and secure?
faq_answer_10_steps:
Absolutely. We take the security and privacy of your personal information seriously.
Here's how we ensure your data is safe:
faq_answer_10_steps_1: Password Protection: Your password is not stored in clear text on our servers. It's securely hashed to protect its confidentiality.
faq_answer_10_steps_2: Limited Access: Your password and personal information are not viewable by any team member. We implement strict access controls to ensure only authorized personnel can handle sensitive data.
faq_answer_10_conclusion: We are committed to maintaining the highest standards of security to safeguard your personal information.
download_description: Here we will explain how to add the site as a Progressive Web App (PWA) on your device.
installation_steps_for_safari: To install this site as a PWA on Safari for iOS:
instalation_safari_step_1: Tap the Share icon (the square with an arrow pointing up) at the bottom of the screen.
instalation_safari_step_2: Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen".
installation_steps_for_chrome: To install this site as a PWA on Chrome for Android:
instalation_chrome_step_1: Tap the three-dot menu icon at the top right corner of the screen.
instalation_chrome_step_2: Select "Add to Home screen" from the menu.
dashboard_welcome:
Welcome to "Real Golf" {user_name} - your ultimate destination for golf challenges! Discover "4 Winning", "Exact", and "Precision" - captivating golf experiences tested with trainers.
You can also save your games in the Database and view them in the Archive. So enjoy practicing and improving your golf skills!
no_highscore_yet: Please first play a round of One Player Precision to get a Highscore before it can be displayed here.
daily_highscore: Today's highscore is: {dailyValue}, last updated on the {lastUpdatedDate}.
weekly_highscore: This Week's highscore is: {weeklyValue}, last updated on the {lastUpdatedDate}.
monthly_highscore: This Month's highscore is: {monthlyValue}, last updated on the {lastUpdatedDate}.
yearly_highscore: This Year's highscore is: {yearlyValue}, last updated on the {lastUpdatedDate}.
all_time_highscore: Your all-time highscore is {allTimeValue}, last exceeded on the {lastUpdatedDate}.
latest_game_saved: The last game you have saved in the Database
game_associated_with: Team the game is associated with
see_all_games: You can see all your games in the Archive.
error_loading_latest_game: You don't have any games saved, play a Game and save it in the Database to see it here
name: Name
might_have_successfully_registered: You can still try to login here: Login, or open the Dashboard
successfully_registered: Welcome {name}! You can now open the Dashboard.
no_games_found_for_user: No games found for this user.
